kickstart.description: UCB's Ganglia Cluster Monitoring tool. This node sets up the ganglia webpage, and gmetad meta daemon. Should only be included by frontend nodes.

kickstart.post:
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr ganglia_address 224.0.0.3
/sbin/chkconfig --add ganglia-restore-rrds /sbin/chkconfig --add gmetad
ln -s /opt/ganglia/sbin/gmetad /usr/sbin/gmetad
mkdir -p /etc/ganglia

/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host ganglia gmond localhost > \ /etc/ganglia/gmond.conf
# # The Gmetad configuration file for this cluster. # Generated automatically by ganglia-server.xml. # data_source "&Info_ClusterName;" localhost:8649
# Rocks custom RRA policy # new default policy are 20MB per node # this policy are 3M per node # # 10 hours at 15 sec resolution, 24 hours at 60 sec resolution, 7.2 days at 4.25 min resolution, # 28 days at 16 min resolution, 3740 days at 2.4 hours resolution RRAs "RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:1:2440" "RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:4:1440" "RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:17:2440" "RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:67:2440" \ "RRA:AVERAGE:0.5:576:3740"

mkdir -p /var/lib/ganglia/rrds
# We use 25% of available mem for RRD storage. RRDSIZE=`gawk '/MemTotal:/ { print int($2/4) }' /proc/meminfo`000
# The ram-backed filesystem for ganglia RRD graph databases. tmpfs /var/lib/ganglia/rrds tmpfs size=$RRDSIZE,gid=nobody,uid=nobody,defaults 1 0
mkdir -p /var/lib/ganglia-web/dwoo mkdir -p /var/lib/ganglia-web/dwoo/compiled mkdir -p /var/lib/ganglia-web/dwoo/cache chown -R apache:apache /var/lib/ganglia-web/dwoo
mkdir -p /var/lib/ganglia-web/conf chown -R apache:apache /var/lib/ganglia-web/conf
#!/bin/sh
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks run host localhost '/sbin/service gmond restart' /opt/rocks/bin/rocks run host '/sbin/service gmond restart'
